doc.previous: In certain cases all editors are allowed to submit modifications but review is required for some editors For example the German Wikipedia maintains stable versions of articles 24 which have passed certain reviews Following protracted trials and community discussion the English Wikipedia introduced the pending changes system in December 2012 25 Under this system new users edits to certain controversial or vandalism prone articles are subject to review from an established Wikipedia editor before publication 26
